meanings.definition: The quality or state of being outgoing.
meanings.sent1: Her outgoingness made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: I admire his outgoingness and ability to make friends easily.
meanings.sent3: His outgoingness shines through even in the quietest of gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The outgoingness of the sun brought warmth to the chilly morning.
meanings.sent5: The outgoingness of the child's laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: The act of being sociable and friendly.
meanings.sent1: His outgoingness at the event made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: She exudes outgoingness wherever she goes.
meanings.sent3: The outgoingness of the puppy charmed all the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The outgoingness of the flowers in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent5: The outgoingness of the team captain motivated the players to do their best.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be extroverted and expressive.
meanings.sent1: His outgoingness in social situations is contagious.
meanings.sent2: The outgoingness of her personality brightens up any room.
meanings.sent3: The outgoingness of the clown entertained the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: The outgoingness of the river flowed freely through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The outgoingness of the artist's brush strokes captured the essence of the scene.
